short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cross-listing and Poshmark Automation Tool. Crosslist, relist, delist items on multiple marketplaces and automate Poshmark workflow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PrimeLister is a software tool that helps e-commerce sellers and re-sellers manage their inventory, list items onto various marketplaces, cross-list from one marketplace to another, re-list stale listings, and automate everyday tasks on the marketplaces.

Sell More, Faster, and Easier 💰
PrimeLister is the right tool for you if you own an online selling business that targets people on various marketplaces for selling. Use PrimeLister to put less effort into inventory management, save time when publishing listings on various marketplaces, and make more sales from day one.

PrimeLister provides two main tools for online sellers:
↗️ Cross-lister Tool - You can manage your inventory and easily perform listing operations across multiple marketplaces using the Cross-lister Tool of PrimeLister.
🤖 Poshmark Automation Tool (aka Poshmark Bot) - You can automate your entire reselling workflow and maximize the potential of your closet using the Automation Tool of PrimeLister.

Supported Marketplaces 🧩
The Cross-lister Tool of PrimeLister supports the following marketplaces: 
Poshmark, Mercari, eBay, Etsy, Depop. 
The US, CA, AU countries of these platforms are supported. 
The list of all supported marketplaces: 
https://www.primelister.com/cross-listing-marketplaces

The Poshmark Automation Tool of PrimeLister supports all countries:
🇺🇸 🇨🇦 🇦🇺

Start Using PrimeLister for Free 🆓
The PrimeLister Chrome Extension is free to install and has a 7-day free trial. You can start using PrimeLister today without entering any credit card info.

Why Use Cross-lister Tool
🧶 Get Organized: Import your listings into one place and organize your complete inventory with tags and groups.
🌱 Stay Up-to-date: Make important changes to your listings in one place and keep your listed inventory fresh.
🤑 Drive Sales: Distribute your items to multiple marketplaces from one place and make more money.
⌛️ Save Time: Organize, publish, and update listings faster than ever in one place and save yourself time.

Why Use Poshmark Automation Tool 
🧑‍✈️Put time-consuming reselling tasks on autopilot: It is a piece of cake to increase your sales and make money on your closet if you integrate our solution into your reselling flow.
🧰 Everything You Need to Replace Your Virtual Assistant: You will not need any other virtual assistant service or software to manage your closet, interactions, and sales once you have PrimeLister's industry-leading toolkit.
🤑 Increase Sales: Increase your sales and selling speed with the help of extensive automation.
🦾 Automate Your Work: Spend less time on your closet with automated shares, offers, likes, and reactions.
💟 Grow Your Audience: Interact with other Poshers with automated follows, and reactions in order to have a strong brand.
👍 Use Safely: Stay indistinguishable from a real user and use the tool without disclosing your credentials.

Cross-lister Tool Features 🚀
➡️ Import your listings: Import your listings into the inventory. Once you are done, your listings will be paired with their published copies on different marketplaces and will be managed easily within this inclusive inventory.
➡️ Organize your inventory: Organize your inventory with tags and groups. Once you are done, you will use tags to search for items by details like price, size, gender, shipping type, etc. As well, you will use the groups to post listings in bulk in an instant or at a scheduled time.
➡️ Cross-list your listings: Cross-post your listings with one click. Once you are done, you will not have to copy/paste information manually, the detail fields of the new listing will be auto-filled and the images will be uploaded automatically to the listing.
➡️ Cross-list your items from/to all supported marketplaces.
➡️ Re-list and delist your listings. Re-list and delist your listing with one click. Once you are done, re-listing will refresh your stale listings, and delisting will help to sync your listings on different platforms when your items get sold. You can both re-list and delist your listings in bulk.
➡️ Re-list your listings automatically on all supported marketplaces of the Re-lister Tool.
➡️ Schedule to post later: Schedule to post your listings later. Once you are done, the scheduled crossposting, re-listing, and delisting tasks get done automatically at a pre-selected time.

Automation Tool Features 🚀
➡️ Share Your Closet: Share your closet with one click. You can share your closet or specific items with your followers, and on the feed and party pages. Sharing increases your exposure and chances of making a sale.
➡️ Relist Your Closet: Relist your closet with one click. You can relist your closet or specific items. Relisting helps your items appear in the search results and on the feed page more frequently by publishing a fresh copy of your list from scratch.
➡️ Send Bulk Offers: Send bulk offers with one click. You can send offers for your closet or specific items through an easy-to-use interface for managing your offer settings and filters. Sending bulk offers attracts your potential buyers and boosts quick sales.
➡️ Auto Send Offers to Likers: Send offers to likers automatically whenever somebody likes your items. You can activate the automation for sending offers to likers through an easy-to-use interface for managing your offer settings and filters. Sending offers automatically attracts potential buyers and increases the likelihood of a quick sale.
➡️ Bulk Price Update: Update the price of multiple listings at once with one click. You can update the prices of your closet or specific items through an easy-to-use interface for managing your price updating settings and filters. Updating the prices keeps listing prices up to date for various marketing strategies including seasonal campaigns.
➡️ Follow/Unfollow People: Follow or unfollow people with one click. You can expand or narrow your audience. Following other people draws more shoppers into your closet page and increases your sales with the help of word of mouth.
➡️ Auto Activity Returner: Follow people back and share items back automatically whenever a new follower or share arrives. You can activate the automation for sharing back and following back through an easy-to-use interface for managing your automation settings. Auto reactions keep the relationship with your followers warm.
➡️ Organize Your Closet: Organize your closet with one click. You can change the order in which your items are sorted on your closet page. Organizing your closet keeps your inventory in a certain order and pins the most interesting items to the top of your listings.
➡️ Auto Captcha Solving: Solve captchas automatically. You do not need to intervene manually to solve the CAPTCHAs while you use the tool. The extension works continuously without interruption thanks to auto CAPTCHA solving.
➡️ Activity Monitor: Track your activity history with one click. You can view the history of your manual activity (including instant and scheduled tasks) and automated activity from the activity monitoring screen in the tool. Monitoring your activity provides useful information about your reselling activity.
➡️ Human Behavior: Enjoy the human-likeliness of the automation tool. You do not need to be concerned while using it. It is designed to mimic human behavior while performing all types of tasks ​and works with time intervals between each task.
➡️ 7/24 Customer Service: Get instant customer service with one click. The friendly customer success team at PrimeLister is ready to back you whenever you get question marks in your mind or technical support inquiries regarding the use of the automation tool.

Cross-lister Tool - All Features:
➡️ Import listings to the inventory
➡️ Cross-list listings
➡️ Re-list listings
➡️ Delist listing
➡️ Bulk listing
➡️ Scheduled listing

Automation Tool - All Features:
➡️ Share your closet to Feed
➡️ Share your closet to Party
➡️ Relist your items from scratch
➡️ Send bulk offers
➡️ Auto Send Offers to Likers
➡️ Bulk Price Update
➡️ Follow/Unfollow People
➡️ Auto Activity Returner
➡️ Organize Your Closet
➡️ Auto Captcha Solving
➡️ Activity Monitor: 
➡️ Human Behavior
➡️ 7/24 Customer Service
